title: client crashed when i play ranked, then get banned for 20 mins
body: this isnt my fault, i wasnt afking, after i relog it i instantly back in the game, but my team was remake the game. after that i got banned for 5 games and i must wait 20 min for playing this..

replies.body: [Leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) lower priority queues will occur after multiple leaves and not just one, so you may have a history of leaves here.  Even if it wasn't intentional, it still causes other players a negative experience.  The best way to recover is by playing without issues, so let me know what you're experiencing in detail to get it fixed for good.  Let me know!
